resources.string: What are you going to do?
What would you like to do?
For adding a new idea, click on +
For adding a new event, click on +
It is time to set new goals!
Not enough funds on the balance sheet !
Your money is your "canned" time and energy that you spent to earn it.
\"Get into the habit of keeping records of income and expenses electronically or in writing.\"
Get rid of credit cards, consumer loans, and other debt.

\" Debt is a psychological burden, putting people under stress and making them worry about the future. As a result, you will pay for using other people\'s money not only with your own money, but also with your health and energy.\"

\" When you break this rule, you lose the harmony in your own life. You are spending money that you have not earned, In fact, using what does not belong to you, you can lose it at any time! Realize the difference between your needs — what you really need, and your desires — what "it would be nice to have". Set your priorities so that you first close all the needs, and then what remains to be allowed for wishlist and entertainment.\"
Avoid impulsive purchases and unnecessary spending.
\" Make a shopping list before going to the store and stick to it.\"

\" Work on improving your skills Find out what exactly you are paid for, and develop in this area. Acquiring deeper knowledge in a narrow niche, expanding your area of expertise and responsibility, improving the quality of the work done, and getting the work done faster can be the key to increasing your income. ods.\"
\" The increase in income is the result of long and regular work, so be patient and start moving towards the goal in small steps.\"
Create and purchase additional sources of income.
\" The secret to the financial stability of many successful people lies in multiple sources of income.\"
Take care of your money — do not spend it on gambling, financial pyramids, dubious enterprises and transactions.
\" There are great risks to spoil relations with people and lose money. Leave the banks to their work\"
Do not throw away even a small amount of money.
\" A penny saves not only the ruble, but also the dollar and the euro!\"

\" Regularly pulling money out of your wallet, but not bringing the old pleasure. We spend money to get some emotions. At the same price, different things can bring different amounts of emotions. For example, coffee in a cafe for 200 rubles, which you used to drink after lunch, no longer causes delight and satisfaction, but still costs your budget 1000 rubles a week. For the same thousand, you could get a lot more emotions by going to a massage or a movie.\"
Feel free to ask for a discount and take advantage of special offers.
\" The seller will probably be more profitable to offer you a discount and sell the product than to refuse the discount and not sell anything.\"
Study the literature on financial literacy.
\" Your well-being directly depends on your level of financial literacy!\"
Create a personal financial plan and follow it.
Pay yourself first — it\'s too late to try to save money after you\'ve already spent it.
\" Save some of the money to achieve your financial goals as soon as you get them.\"
Investing is easier and more affordable than you think.
\" In addition, some financial instruments allow you to automate this process in many ways. The main thing is to understand whether it is so important to you that you are ready to start acting?\"
\" High-quality products, as a rule, are more expensive, but it is cheaper to use.\"
Make sure that your income always grows faster than your expenses.
\" At the same time, your income should always be greater than your expenses. This is one of the basic principles of financial well-being.\"
Always count the money, even if it is small.

\" Small daily expenses can add up to huge amounts over the years and even more over the decades. Every time you say to yourself something like "1000 rubles is not money, it is not a pity to lose", you take away from yourself in the future tens and hundreds of thousands, which this thousand would turn into if you invested it correctly.\"
Compare prices in different places before you buy something.

\" It is best to measure the price in the hours of your life — how long you will have to work to get the right amount for this purchase. This will make it easier for you to compare the price of the product you are paying with its value to you. Are you ready to give an hour of your life for a cup of coffee? And a month of life for a new phone?\"
\"Do not envy other people, but learn from them what they understand better than you.\"
Realize that your financial well-being depends entirely on you and your actions.
Go on a "money diet" right now!
\" Change your lifestyle right now, without delay. This will save you thousands of dollars over the course of a year.\"
Today you have already marked the completion of this task
Did you really complete the task today?

Balance.
 Here you can see your current balance. Your balance increases when you add income. Decreases when you add an expense or frequent expenses.
 
Savings.
 Here you can record your current savings status by clicking on the plus button. (See also) You can't spend out of your current savings . With a long click on the button, you can delete the entire amount of savings .
 
Revenue.
 By clicking on the plus button, you can add your income . Every time you add income, your balance increases.
 
Expenses.
 By clicking on the minus button, you can add your expenses. You need to enter the amount and description of the expense (preferably). For your convenience, we have created a section: expense history, at the top in the "EXPENSES" section you can track your expenses.
 
Frequent spending.
 By clicking on the plus button, you can add your frequent spending (Item). This is useful so that you can track what you often spend money on. By clicking on the Item, you can add the amount spent and see the total amount of money spent. Also, by swiping to the right, you can remove an Item from the list of frequent spenders.
Luck on closer inspection turns out to be just the result of a lot of work and careful preparation.
If you decide to do something, but do not start doing it within 72 hours-in 85% of cases, you will never do it.
\"The one who does, expects success. The one who "tries" expects that something will interfere with him.\"
Half the effort does not give half the result, but a zero result.
Those who work all day have no time to earn money.
The greatest talent is to be able to find motivation for your own actions.
Financial well-being is impossible without financial constraints and planning your spending. Financial freedom goes through financial constraints.
It is better to start badly than to do nothing well.
Think about your health. Success is impossible without good health.
\" Wealth without health will not bring joy.\"
It is better to go to the goal at the speed of a turtle than at the speed of light to come up with excuses for why you are standing still.
Take your favorite hobby and build a career on it.
\"For good earnings, you need good knowledge.\"
Try to constantly learn, read, expand your horizons. Fools are lucky only in the casino, and then rarely.
Wealth is not how much you spent in a casino, restaurant, resort, or store.
\" Wealth is what you have set aside and saved.\"
Only fools get lucky once. Smart people are always lucky.
You are not responsible for all events
But you are always responsible for your interpretation of events and for your reaction to them.
\"To sit and wait for a miracle is as stupid as an athlete sitting at home in front of the TV,\"
watch the Olympic Games and hope to get a gold medal at them.
Money always has exactly the meaning that we attach to it.
Money alone does not make anyone happy or unhappy. They are neither good nor bad.

A happy person with money will become even happier. The pessimist who makes a problem out of everything will get even more problems with money. Money reveals the character of the owner. They\'re like a magnifying glass.
\"No one gets rich just because they earn a lot.\"
You are rich only when you can live on the interest of your capital without having to work: money works for you.
Principle statement: never take the advice of a person who is not what you would like to be.
To live without responsibility is to degrade to a state of impotent sacrifice.
\" It means living by the rules that others have written for you.\"
Most people overestimate what they can do in a year and underestimate what they can do in ten years.
\"We see roses, but we don\'t see thorns. We see success, but not preparation for it.\"
And we don\'t see other people\'s failures. We will be amazed to learn how carefully the "lucky ones" prepare their luck.
There is a fundamental difference between the game you play to avoid losing and the one you want to win.
Don\'t you get paid what you\'re worth? Not if you work for that money. –
\" so that\'s what you\'re worth. If something does not suit you-change your job, lifestyle, change yourself.\"
You can set it to the time you need
I had a dream in a dream that was a dream
\""Before you start, we suggest you get acquainted with the application\"
There are two navigation tools available here
The side one opens by clicking on the burger which is located in the upper left corner
After switching to each of the windows, wait for the briefing to start
Displays the days updated for the next 3 months
By clicking on the date you can set an event or a new task on a certain day of the week By clicking on the date you can set an event or a new task on a certain day of the week
All your cards from the Habits,Categories,Events windows are displayed here
By clicking on the habit cards or categories, you can perform a certain action
By opening the sidebar you can see your profile
Avatar, name and current level, in order to set the avatar and name, click on them
The level increases for certain actions such as performing habits, tasks, and the like
Cards inside which you can write notes or tasks
Click on a card from the list to open a window with actions
By clicking on this button, you can create a new card by specifying the category name and icon
There is a list hidden under every day that can be filled out
To see what is planned for a particular day, click on it
You can set a scheduled task from the list to open a window with actions
By clicking on this button you can create cases for a specific day of the week
Optionally, you can set a reminder
By clicking on this button you can create events for a specific date
Your list of habits that you want to instill in yourself
On the left is indicated how many days you have already fixed the habit
On the right, how many days do you need to hold on
By clicking on the card you can mark the completion of the habit for the current day and by pressing on the card you can open a window with actions
By clicking on this button you can create a new habit
Your list of processes that require concentration
This window is created based on the theories of 10,000 hours
Which says to become a professional in a certain field, you need to spend about 10 thousand hours studying it
By clicking on this button, you can create a new process, work with a timer or with a stopwatch
This window is based on a team work system
Where team members create a daily progress report and share their plans and problems
This is a very good system to keep yourself in good shape
You can ask a good friend to follow the compilation of standups
And there is just a share function so that you can send it
By clicking on this button you can create a new standup
Your list where your sleep related records are collected
At the top it shows how many hours you slept during the specified day
Then from how many to how many and the date
\"By clicking on the card , you can see what you dreamed that day , of course , if you recorded it
By clicking on this button you can create a new entry
A window for tracking your finances\"
At the top is a card with financial-related tips, a new one appears every time you open this window
The main functions are performed by the Income and Expense buttons
There is also a list of template expenses by clicking on an item you can work with it
\"And of course, the history button where everything is taken into account in addition to template expenses\"
1. Rewrote and reread the code from the lesson
3. Wrote the layout for Settings and for Quiz
5.in History Dat, I wrote the delete All method under the @delete annotation
1. I\'ll reread the QuizApp code for more understanding
2. I will proceed to the implementation of paragraphs 4 and 5
There were difficulties with filling History with fake data
-Implemented testing of the back button if the first page closes the Activity
-Implemented the testing of the response buttons
-Set the timer on onAnswerClick so that when you click on the answer, you wait 1 second before flipping to the next question
1.I will start the layout of QuizResult
2.I implement the functions of determining the availability of Internet or WI-FI
With mixing of questions and embedding in the answer sheet
A visual image is a good way to consolidate the idea that has come
When you click on the card, the picture opens in full size
By clicking on this button you can write down an idea

- Here you can mark that you have completed your task from habits, view events and go to the desired category.\n - Long press on the date in the calendar that is at the top of the window will allow you to add a new event or task for that day to your schedule.
- To create a new category, click on +.\n - A long press on the category will open a window where you can edit, delete or block it, as well as change your password.

- To create a new entry, click on +. You can choose one or several days at once.\n - By clicking on the day of the week, you can view all entries for that day. \n - A long press on the record will allow you to delete or edit it.
- To create a new event, click on +. You can also set a reminder for the time you need.\n - A long press on the event will allow you to delete or edit it.

A window that will allow you to develop the desired habit.
 - To create a new habit, click on +.
 - By clicking on the habit, you can note that you have completed the task today.
 - A long press will allow you to delete or edit it. Button in the upper left corner will open the menu. Here you can find out your level, choose an avatar and add a name.

The window was created based on the theory of 10,000 hours, which states that this is how much time you need to spend to achieve professionalism in your chosen field.
 - By clicking on + you can add a new action, as well as open a timer or stopwatch.
 - By clicking on an action in the list, you can specify how many minutes you spent on it. The time will be summed up.
 - A long press will open the timer or stopwatch from where the time will be added to your record. If you wish, you can immediately delete it.

The practice used in large companies to optimize the process. Every employee writes a daily report on the work done and the problems encountered.\n - - The + button will allow you to create a new standup.\n - A long press on the record will open a window where you can delete, edit or share the standup.

A window where you can track the time spent sleeping.
 - By clicking on + you can create a new record.
 - By clicking on the entry you can read what you dreamed.
 - A long press will allow you to edit or delete an entry.
- By clicking on + you can add a new idea.\n - By clicking on the record you can view the picture, a long press will allow you to delete or edit the record.

A window for tracking your finances.
 - At the top is a card with tips that will allow you to manage your money more productively.
 - The 'Income' and 'Expense' buttons will allow you to add a record of how much money you received and how much you spent, respectively.
 - There are template costs here, if you wish, you can create your own template by clicking on +.
 - A long press on the template will allow you to delete it.
 - History will allow you to track all your financial changes.
- Here you can change the theme and language of the application.
